short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crossplatform configuration tool for Cleanflight flight control system

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to configure your aircraft via a GUI.

Supports Cleanflight only.

https://github.com/cleanflight/cleanflight

The GUI application and flight controller are both open-source.

Various types of aircraft are supported by the tool and by cleanflight, e.g. quadcopters, hexacopters, octocopters and fixed-wing aircraft.
